attributes.action: allow people to put there names down in opposition to a petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be a button on the e-petition website that allows people to show that they are opposed a petition on the website. Currently, if you strongly disagree with a petition, you can't do anything sensible about it.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
